trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ExtensionElement"></xref> instances.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ExtensionElementCollection"></xref> class.
Adds a configuration element to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ExtensionElementCollection"></xref>.
When adding, an element is considered a duplicate only if the keys are identical but the values are different.
Elements with identical keys and values are accepted silently because the elements do not compete.
However, an element with an identical key but a different value cannot be added because there is no logic to determine which of the competing values should be honored.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to add.
An extension with the same name or type as element already exists in the collection.
Adds a configuration element to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ExtensionElementCollection"></xref>, at the specified location.
When adding, an element is considered a duplicate only if the keys are identical but the values are different.
Elements with identical keys and values are accepted silently because the elements do not compete.
However, an element with an identical key but a different value cannot be added because there is no logic to determine which of the competing values should be honored.
The index location at which to add element.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to add.
An extension with the same name or type as element already exists in the collection.
Gets the element key for the specified configuration element.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to return the key for.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that acts as the key for the specified configuration element.
element is `null` or empty.

Gets a value indicating whether an attempt to add a duplicate <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ExtensionElementCollection"></xref> will cause an exception to be thrown.

`true` if an attempt to add a duplicate <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ExtensionElementCollection"></xref> will cause an exception to be thrown; otherwise, `false`.
